thread.section_title: CanvasOnSale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CanvasOnSale | canvasonsale.com | 3 of 24
thread.title: Shawna Ferguson

author: Shawna Ferguson
title: Shawna Ferguson
text: Canvasonsale.com is a great company to work with - my products came out exactly as described/desired. There was a printing issue with one item that took a few tries to solve, but the customer service staff was so understanding, easy to work with, and quick! I would happily recommend this company to anyone looking for creative ways to display their photos.
